item.title: Theodora add a quote by Charles Schultz
item.description: "<b>I</b> love mankind ... it's <b>people</b> I can't stand!!" -- Charles Schultz

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Don't think or judge, just listen." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Life is an awful, ugly place to not have a best friend." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Sigmund Freud
item.description: "One day, in retrospect, the years of struggle will strike you as the most beautiful." -- Sigmund Freud

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "I like flaws. I think they make things interesting." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "The creation of a thousand forests is in one acorn" -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Henry James
item.description: "It's time to start living the life you've imagined." -- Henry James

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Because I don't live in either my past or my future.I'm interested only in the present"." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Harry Crews
item.description: "There is something beautiful about all scars of whatever nature. A scar means the hurt is over, the wound is closed and healed, done with." -- Harry Crews

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Richard Bandler
item.description: "If you can't enjoy what you have, you can't enjoy more of it." -- Richard Bandler

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "No one loses anyone, because no one owns anyone. That is the true experience of freedom: having the most important thing in the world without owning it" -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Theodora add a quote by William James
item.description: "To change one's life: 1. Start immediately, 2. Do it flamboyantly, 3. No exceptions." -- William James

item.title: Theodora add a quote by C. JoyBell C.
item.description: "The only thing that will ever make me fall in love is: if I fall in love." -- C. JoyBell C.

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "There comes a time when the world gets quiet and the only thing left is your own heart. So you'd better learn the sound of it. Otherwise you'll never understand what it's saying." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Jean-Luc Godard
item.description: "To be immortal and then die" -- Jean-Luc Godard

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "What a lover’s heart knows let no man’s brain dispute." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Rabindranath Tagore
item.description: "You can’t cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water." -- Rabindranath Tagore

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Bill Keane
item.description: "Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present." -- Bill Keane

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Everything you can imagine is real." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Theodora add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt." -- Charles M. Schulz
